mapper.select: SELECT om.order_no, LISTAGG(cast(m.material_name || ot.order_tcount as VARCHAR(100)),'/') within group(order by m.material_no) ORDER_MATERIAL, om.order_method, com.com_name, om.order_payprice FROM order_main OM JOIN company COM ON om.com_no=com.com_no JOIN order_item OI ON om.order_no=oi.order_no JOIN order_topping OT ON oi.order_ino=ot.order_ino JOIN material m ON ot.material_no=m.material_no WHERE om.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} group by om.order_no, om.order_method, com.com_name, om.order_payprice
SELECT d.DELIVERY_NAME, d.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, c.COM_Name FROM DELIVERY d JOIN company c ON c.com_no = d.com_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} order by d.delivery_no

SELECT ci.issue_no, c.coupon_name, ci.issue_status, ci.issue_cdate || ' ~ ' ||ci.issue_edate possiblePeriod, c.coupon_condition FROM coupon_issue CI JOIN coupon c ON ci.coupon_no = c.coupon_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ci.issue_edate >= SYSDATE

SELECT ci.issue_no, c.coupon_name, ci.issue_status, ci.issue_cdate || ' ~ ' ||ci.issue_edate possiblePeriod FROM coupon_issue CI JOIN coupon c ON ci.coupon_no = c.coupon_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CI.issue_edate < SYSDATE
select board_no, board_title, board_answer, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='3' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select board_no, board_title, board_answer, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='0' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select board_no, board_title, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='1' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select com_no, com_name, lat, lon from company order by com_no

select mp.mypizza_no, mp.mypizza_name, img.img_filepath, img.img_changename, img.img_categ from my_pizza mp join image img on img.mypizza_no = mp.mypizza_no where mp.member_no=#{memberNo} and img.img_categ=3 and img.img_status='Y'

select om.order_date, om.order_receiver, om.order_rtel, LISTAGG(cast(ma.material_name||ot.order_tcount as VARCHAR(100)),'/') within group(order by ma.material_no) ORDER_MATERIAL, oi.order_tcount, om.order_payprice, d.delivery_name, d.delivery_address, c.com_name from order_main OM join order_item OI on om.order_no = oi.order_no join order_topping OT on ot.order_ino = oi.order_ino join material MA on ot.material_no = ma.material_no join delivery d on d.delivery_no=om.delivery_no join company c on c.com_no = om.com_no where om.order_no=#{orderNo} group by om.order_date, om.order_receiver, om.order_rtel, oi.order_tcount, om.order_payprice, d.delivery_name, d.delivery_address, c.com_name

select om.order_date, om.order_receiver, om.order_rtel, LISTAGG(cast(ma.material_name||ot.order_tcount as VARCHAR(100)),'/') within group(order by ma.material_no) ORDER_MATERIAL, om.order_payprice, d.delivery_name, d.delivery_address, c.com_name, cp.coupon_categ, cp.coupon_name, cp.coupon_rdiscount, cp.coupon_pdiscount,
decode(cp.coupon_categ, 0, cp.coupon_rdiscount, 1, cp.coupon_pdiscount) discount
from order_main OM join order_item OI on om.order_no = oi.order_no join order_topping OT on ot.order_ino = oi.order_ino join material MA on ot.material_no = ma.material_no join coupon_issue ci on ci.order_no = om.order_no join delivery d on d.delivery_no=om.delivery_no join company c on c.com_no = om.com_no join coupon cp on cp.coupon_no = ci.coupon_no
where om.order_no=#{orderNo}
group by om.order_date, om.order_receiver, om.order_rtel, om.order_payprice, d.delivery_name, d.delivery_address, c.com_name, decode(cp.coupon_categ, 0, cp.coupon_rdiscount, 1, cp.coupon_pdiscount), cp.coupon_categ, cp.coupon_name,cp.coupon_rdiscount, cp.coupon_pdiscount
